bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. Pathological Mechanism brought forth by stagnant blood that congeals to nodes and may in turn generate further diseases. Xin xiu ben cao 新修本草 Substance Entry nao sha 硇砂 : 主積聚，破結血、爛胎， 止痛下氣 , “It controls accumulations and collections, breaks through bound blood, destroys (i.e. aborts) a fetus, stops pain and causes qi to move downward”.
